All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Algorithm
This class provides a set of algorithms for generating labyrinths.
ColoredPoint
The ColoredPoint class extends the Point class and adds a color attribute to the point.
Drawable2D
This interface represents an object that can be drawn on a 2D graphics context.
Filter
A utility class that provides color filtering operations such as mixing and applying masks (musk).
KeyDefinition
Represents a mapping between actions and key codes for keyboard inputs.
KeyDefinition.Action
Enumeration of possible actions that can be mapped to keys.
KeyLogic
Handles the logic for interpreting key inputs and performing actions based on key bindings.
Labyrinth2D
Represents a 2D labyrinth with walls and light sources.
LabyrinthFrame
Represents a frame for displaying a labyrinth game.
LabyrinthGraphics2D
This class provides the logic for rendering a 2D labyrinth with raycasting effects to simulate the player's view of the environment, including light sources, reflections, and walls.
LabyrinthPanel
Represents a panel for rendering the labyrinth game and handling user input.
LightSource
The LightSource class represents a light-emitting source in the 2D space.
Line2D
Represents a 2D line in the Cartesian plane.
Main
 
MathColor
Represents a color using double precision floating-point values for the red, green, and blue components.
MiniMap
Represents a 2D minimap of a labyrinth, displaying walls, light sources, and the player.
Player
The Player class represents a player in a 2D space, extending the Point class.
Point
The Point class represents a point in a 2D space with x and y coordinates.
UIKeyListener
An interface for handling key events in a user interface (UI).
WallEnum
The WallEnum enumeration defines different types of walls, each with a specific type identifier, color, and absorption coefficient.
WallType
The WallType class extends the ColoredPoint class and adds the concept of a wall type represented by the WallEnum.
